content:
Prev: Sara and Timothy Up: Sara and Timothy Next: Timothy reading

Timothy at the piano



At the Cassels' house while we were visiting there for Thanksgiving.
Timothy was very interested to discover how a piano worked and how it differed
from the electronic keyboard at our house. I meant to reshoot this, as it is
a little blurred from subject motion and wide aperture, but the light was never good enough.
Taken Thursday, November 27, 2003, 02:03:02pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 6.8Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/5s @ F4.0, ISO 400, 28mm/F2.8 (45mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 4100:10, -0.5:12:60:80:0:25:15+M, Level
